results.title: Chain "Live Laughter Love"
results.description:
Chain "Live, laugh, love"

Silver cabochon necklace with saying **Live every moment, laugh every day, love immeasurable**

Pendant diameter 30 mm with a small silver-coloured heart pendant
Ball chain 80 cm long

Handmade by myself. It is fashion jewellery. The sockets and small parts are made of metal and according to the manufacturer nickel-free. Not waterproof!

If you need a different chain length, please include in the comment! The chain cannot be opened!
If you would like this motif as a keyfob, please write to!

results.title: Personalized Pillow, Love Every Moment Laugh Everyday Live Beyond Words Pillow
results.description:
- 100% Poly Oxford.
- The pillow case is soft, light, durable and comfortable to use.
- Vivid printing, durable saw lining.
- There are many sizes, suitable for different bed sizes.
- Washing before first use; Machine wash in cold and tumble dry on low.
- You can use it wherever you want. It is perfect for mother's day, father's day, valentines day, honeymoon, birthday parties, anniversaries, Christmas or any concept. 
- You can show your love to her/him with this throw pillow case. If you are looking for a gift that show your love, it is best for you because it is customized. 
- You can create your own unique pillow cover which suit your unique love. Add a touch of graceful color to your living room, made your home more full of vitality. 
=>These awesome pillow cases are perfect for decorating your room in a simple and fashion way.

Comes with 24 tags in shapes of hearts and circles. Ready to hang!

MDF and plywood

18"W x 5"L
24 tags, 1-1/4" diameter, each

results.title: Live / Laugh / Love iPhone Case
results.description:
This "Live Laugh Love" iPhone case makes a great gift for yourself or loved ones. Celebrate the good times and remember what matters most when you use your phone.

This sleek iPhone case protects your phone from scratches, dust, oil, and dirt. It has a solid back and flexible sides that make it easy to take on and off, with precisely aligned port openings. 

• BPA free Hybrid Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and Polycarbonate (PC) material
• Solid polycarbonate back
• Flexible, see-through polyurethane sides
• .5 mm raised bezel
• Wireless charging compatible
• The SE case fits the 2020 iPhone SE model

results.title: Live Laugh Love Stencil and Family is Forever. Reusable Stencils for Wood Signs, Canvas & More. 2 pc Stencil Set
results.description:
🎨 GREAT VARIETY OF HOME DECOR STENCILS: Decorate your home with a variety of beautifully designed stencils. Each stencil measures 14.75 x 6 inches

🎨 DURABLE, FLEXIBLE AND REUSABLE: These stencils are made of premium quality laser cut 10 mil plastic with the ideal flexibility for painting on multiple flat surfaces including walls, wood, glass, fabric, canvas and furniture.

🎨 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We are a family-owned business dedicated to customer satisfaction. Crafting and stencils are our passion and if for any reason you are not satisfied with our high-quality stencils, we promise you a refund

Keys facts about our stencils:
✎Durable, flexible, and reusable
✎Laser-cut design with 10 mil (.25) thickness – #1 rated thickness for stencil painting on wood, canvas, and more
✎All stencils are made of eco-friendly food-safe PET plastic

📣Please note, stencil sizing is based on the PHYSICAL stencil, not text or image. Image/Text will be smaller than the listed size as we allow for a border to provide an area for masking off. If you have specific sizing questions, please don't hesitate to ask. 📣

results.title: Live Every Moment Laugh Every Day Love Beyond Words Vinyl Wall Decal Sticker
results.description:
Description:

Live every moment, Laugh every day, Love beyond words. These are words to live by, put them in your home today!

Sizes & Colors:

15" wide x 9.5" tall
18" wide x 11.5" tall
25" wide x 15.9" tall
30" wide x 19.1" tall
40" wide x 25.5" tall
50" wide x 31.8" tall
60" wide x 38.2" tall

The drop down menu for size is to select how WIDE you would like the decal to be.

Sample image shows a black and white color choice. All colors are matte (non-gloss) unless otherwise specified.

Images displayed are for reference only and may not reflect exact size and color. Sizes listed are for the entire design as a whole as if a box is drawn around the outer most portion of the design. Some designs depending on size may come in multiple sections to install.

About:

They are easy to apply! Our decals come with transfer paper and application instructions. Just peel the backing away and place the decals where you want them. Smooth them out with a squeegee or hard card, and peel away the transfer paper.

Decals may be applied to hard, clean, smooth and dry surfaces. They are removable but not reusable once applied. When applying decal to freshly painted surface, please ensure the paint is fully cured. When removing decals, please use caution. Depending on the age or condition of the painted surface underneath, some touch ups may be necessary.

If you need a different size, please feel free to ask. Prices may vary.

Installation Instructions:

http://www.wall-spice.com/uploads/misc/installation-wallspice.pdf
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tY9oNInUg6U

results.title: Home Decor Wall Art, CANVAS, Live Laugh Love, Coral Wall Art, Flower Burst Bathroom Wall Decor, Coral and Teal Bedroom Wall Art - HOME56
results.description:
Set of 3 wall art prints featuring inspirational quote "Live, Laugh, Love" with modern flower burst designs, perfect match for coral, teal and grey decor for bedroom, bathroom, kids room.

Sizing options are available from the drop-down menu. These high quality prints are created digitally and are beautifully printed on Photo Paper or Canvas.

NOW AVAILABLE ON PHOTO PAPER AND CANVAS!!!

***UNFRAMED PRINTS OPTION:
-Printed on Luster Photo Paper for a more professional look. The surface of luster photo paper is also less likely to show fingerprints.
-Frames are NOT included, the prints will ship in flat rigid mailers or mailing tubes depending on the sizes.

***STRETCHED CANVAS OPTION:
-Frame is 1.25" thick and is built with a solid face to prevent loosening and sagging over time.
-Canvas come with finished backing and are ready to hang.


Please note that printed colors may vary from your monitor due to screen resolution and printers.

For more Home & Bedroom Wall Art, please visit my collection at:
www.etsy.com/shop/WallArtBoutique?section_id=16145154

For more information regarding our policy, please check:
www.etsy.com/shop/WallArtBoutique/policy

results.title: Live, love, Laugh. Wooden signs with positive and fun phrases. Decoration for the living room. Gift for mother's day. Poster.
results.description:
Pine wood signs (7.28 inches * 7.28 inches), with original and customizable phrases. 💝
Any of our posters is an ideal and personal gift, since we can personalize the poster by changing the color (you can choose it by looking at the color palette), adding a name, date or appointment change. For this you have the "Personalization" space. 🙌
It has a rope behind to be placed without difficulty or you can simply support them on a shelf.
Note: We can also adapt to other measures or quantities, contact us for information and delivery time.
The colors of the images may vary depending on the light intensity of our devices. 📷
Our posters are made in our own art studio, in Ibiza, with ecological paints, guaranteeing excellent quality, with a beautiful range of colors adding color and life to our home. 🏡 Suitable for interior and exterior. 🌧️☀️
Please provide your phone number for the courier to contact you if necessary in the box below, thank you for your cooperation
Remember to select the ❤ FAVORITE button to save this product for later.

R regular is 21 by 11, M is a little smaller 19 by 10 and fits most about size 6, and S is for the petite 17 by 9 and fits most about size 0. Pick Black or navy blue apron fabric. Will custom make in any pattern or color. Customize your apron. Patterns may vary slightly due to cuts. Completely handmade in NC.

results.title: My Happy Place Unisex Shirt Family Vacation Magic 2020
results.description:
Hi! Thank you so much for checking out our Etsy shop. Below we have all of our sizing information and shop policy. Please carefully check sizing information and color selections because returns will not be permitted due to the custom nature of our items. With that being said – we are here to answer any and all questions you may have before placing your order so the product that you receive is exactly what you wanted. Please don’t hesitate to send us a message and we will respond in a timely manner.

We do our best to have all orders made and shipped either same day or within 24 hours. We make daily trips to the post office to ensure that your items are being shipped in a timely fashion. Please note that if you have a special request or personalization option added to your item – we will message you to confirm what we are going to make is what you requested. We want to make sure that you’re satisfied with what you’re ordering before we print your shipping label.

Note: If you add a personalization option – we like to get confirmation within 24 hours so if you do not respond to our message we will move forward and make it to our best interpretation of your request.

Vinyl Colors: Royal Blue, Sky Blue, Red, Rose Gold, Green, Teal, Hot Pink, Orange, Black, White, Gold, Silver, Maroon, Yellow Gold, Lime Green, and Purple.

If there is a vinyl color that you would like that you don’t see listed please send us a message. We typically have samples on hand which should give us enough to make whichever design you would like.

AVAILABLE SHIRT STYLES:
Please Note: In the rare occurrence that we run out of a specific t-shirt, a suitable replacement of an equal or better brand (same color) will be provided in exchange. It is a difficult time for our t-shirt provider as they can not guarantee every style we list. We will absolutely do our best to accommodate you.  

Adult Unisex: Bella + Canvas

100% Ring Spun Cotton (White, Black, True Royal, Poppy Red, Mint, Columbia Blue, Soft Pink, Mauve)

90% Cotton/10% Polyester (Athletic Heather Grey)

52% Cotton/48% Polyester (Dark Heather Grey, Heather Sea Green, Heather Peach).

-Super Soft
-True To Size, Retail Fit
-Machine Wash Cold or Warm, Inside Out, With Like Colors
-Tumble Dry Low or Air Dry
-DO NOT IRON DIRECTLY ON DESIGN

Chest and Length:
XS: 16.5” / 27’
Small: 18” / 28”
Medium: 20” / 29”
Large: 22” / 30”
XL: 24” / 31”
2XL: 26” / 32”


GILDAN 50/50

50% Cotton / 50% Polyester 5.6 Dryblend Shirt

-Loose Fitting Shirt
-Machine Wash Cold or Warm, Inside Out, With Like Colors
-Tumble Dry Low or Air Dry
-DO NOT IRON DIRECTLY ON DESIGN

Body Width and Length:

Medium: 20.5” / 29”
Large: 22.5” / 30”
XL: 24.5” / 31”
2XL: 26.5” / 32”

Women’s Next Level Racerback Fitted Tank:

-60% Cotton/ 40% Polyester
-Fitted
-Next Level 1533 Racerback Tank

XS: Chest: 14”, Length 27”
Small: Chest: 15”, Length 27.5”
Medium: Chest 16”, Length 28”
Large: Chest 17”, Length 28.5”
XL: Chest 18”, Length 29”
2XL: Chest 19”, Length 29.5”

These tanks are fitted and run on the smaller side. If you are in-between sizes , we recommend that you go up a size. If you have any questions or concerns please send us a message.

Youth Size Shirts

White : Jerzees Brand: 100% Cotton
Black: Gildan Brand: 100% Cotton
Grey: Jerzees Brand: 90% Cotton / 10% Polyester

-Machine Wash Cold or Warm, Inside Out, With Like Colors
-Tumble Dry Low or Air Dry
-DO NOT IRON DIRECTLY ON DESIGN

XL: 18-20

Medium: 17 in x 23 in
Large: 19 in x 24 in
XL: 20 in x 25.5 in

Jerzees (White and Grey)
Medium: 17 in x 22 in
Large: 18 in x 24.5 in
XL: 18.5 in x 26 in




Personalization Options:

We would absolutely love to help you recreate anything you have imagined to be on your shirt. Feel free to message us to see what we can do in terms of colors, adding text, removing text, or anything of the like. We can create a mock-up for you to ensure that you are satisfied before we bring the design to life.


Thank you again and we look forward to working with you!

We try our best to have orders shipped out as quickly as possible. If you request an item to be rush ordered, we will do our best to have it shipped out within 24 hours. No refunds will be issued if the order is not received in time. The items are custom made and we take great pride is ensuring that we're sending you the best possible product we can provide. Priority shipping can take 2-3 days depending on where you are in the country and we can not guarantee any delivery dates but do the best we can to prepare your item for you.
